segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water spilling over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is encouraging him, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny, but also concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
